description: In Publication " page. We are pleased to present the inaugural issue: Oqimta 1 (5773 [2013]) containing thirteen articles. We take this opportunity to invite you to subscribe to our mailing list (see subscribe ), and to send us your submissions (see Instructions for Authors ).

is_part_of.title: Oqimta: Studies in Talmudic and Rabbinic Literature

title: In Publication
